name: Page (Krassenstein, theStoff)
description:
KrassJam 13 in 72 hours.

Krassenstein - Programming

Artstoff - Art / SFX / Particles

Change Log:

0.0.0.4 - 6/22/2020

- Fixed bug where sounds would be muted on start (if you've previously opened it, you have to go into options and turn them on for the first time)

------------------------------------

Controls:

Left Stick / WASD -> Move

Right Stick / Mouse -> Aim

Right Trigger / Left Click -> Fire

Right Shoulder /  Shift -> Roll 

------------------------------------
